author: Paolo Cosci
comment: The watchface is crashing randomly through my day on my Huawei Watch. Already crashed 6 times in less than 8 hours. The battery meter is not accurate at all and sometimes weather does not update... It has the potential but has many bugs too.
title: I really want to rate it good but..

author: Gary DuVall
comment: Fresh design, really looks great on my LG Urbane. The _one_ problem I'm having, however, is the lack of Fahrenheit conversion.

author: Sudantha Victoria
comment: Love the watch face and design. However force closes frequently, and the battery metres does not sync.
title: Good looking watch face with a lot of issues.

author: Christopher Settle
comment: Battery meter not accurate and temperature not changeable to Fahrenheit
title: Awesome, but...

author: Allen Tung
comment: Nice clean design, but phone/watch battery meters are Not showing correct percentage.
title: Could be better

author: Alexander Wekell
comment: Please let me disable weather or change the unit.
title: Great design, no features

author: Brian Hardy
comment: I'd give 5 if I was able to display temperature in Fahrenheit.
title: Good face

author: Nathan Bullen
comment: Love it! Fresh visuals and a clean ambient display!
title: Looks clean!

author: Shawn Clifford
comment: I love it! BUT I would like more HD at the main display.

author: Santone Glenn
comment: Simple, yet stylish, like a black suit.. The weather is icon is quite useless though.. Once it's turns 6pm, it automatically sets to the moon & stars.. The battery gauges are sometimes off too, and by a long shot.. My phone is currently at 41%, but according to my watch face it's only at 2%
title: 3½ Stars

author: Kimbo Price
comment: Displays really amazing on my watch, I just wish it had 24H support, as a non American the 12H setting is kind of annoying.

reply.author: WatchMaster
reply.content: We appreciate the feedback! Your request has been noted and will be updated on our WatchMaster platform. Please visit the app for the update!

title: Looks great on my Moto 360!

author: Mark Davis
comment: Best watch face I've brought for ages. Would recommend to anyone she has a moto 360. Very nice guys keep up the great work.
title: Wicked

author: Bryce Wilson
comment: Would have like to see the weather integrated.
title: Very stylish...

author: Max Bondarenko
comment: weather is totally inacurrate same as the battery levels. why?

author: Dallas Bradford
comment: Is it way you could add the Google fit info to this
title: Nice

author: Jordan Smith
comment: Really nice design here, well proportioned and good info, but seriously lacking HD. It looks a little blurry. Weather wouldn't hurt either. Once HD is added, I'll be downloading and keeping as my everyday watch face.
title: Good design, really needs HD
